## Welcome

This site hosts the **practical workbooks** for  
[**FB2NEP: Nutritional Epidemiology & Public Health**](https://www.reading.ac.uk/ready-to-study/study/2024/food-and-nutritional-sciences-ug/fb2nep-nutritional-epidemiology-and-public-health).

All analyses use a **synthetic, reproducible dataset** based on a fictional cohort.  
For details, see the provenance notes in the repository.

> Please familiarise yourself with these materials.  
> They are an integral part of the **teaching** and will be used in the **assessment**.

---

## Assessment

For the **coursework assessment**, you will analyse the synthetic FB2NEP dataset and prepare a written report of your findings.

Full details and marking criteria are provided in the **Assessment Brief** on Blackboard.
